verbose_text: Optineurin functions as a negative regulator of mGlutR1a signaling by interacting with the mGluR1a receptor and attenuating its ability to couple to phospholipidase Cbeta, which in turn decreases inositol phosphatase production and protein kinase C activation.
evidence: phospholipidase Cbeta              , which in turn decreases inositol phosphatase production and protein kinase C
